722736f-a.title: Manhattan: Riverside Drive - 93rd Street
722736f-a.text:
One of the largest celebrations of Bastille Day took place at the
Joan of Arc Statue, Riverside Drise and 93rd Street, under the
auszices of the Joan of Arc Statue Committee and the American
Defenee Soc.
July,1918 International Films Service
E0 ~ 37E

722900f-c.title: Manhattan: Riverside Drive - 93rd Street
722900f-c.text:
Riverside Park: The Hudson River Yacht Club at the
foot of West 90th Street. Buildings on the right.line
the easterly side of Riverside Drive and overlook the
park and the river.
April 29, 1934
Views: 1-2-3
P. L. Sperr
